homepage.title: Unlock your potential with the best language tutors
homepage.subtitle: Embark on an exciting language journey with our experienced tutors who will guide you to success. Choose your language mentor and start your journey to linguistic mastery!

emptyState.title: No bookings yet
emptyState.description: Start booking lessons with teachers to see them here.

favorites.title: Favorite Teachers
favorites.count: You have {count} favorite teacher{count, plural, one {} other {s}}
favorites.emptyDescription: Start adding teachers to favorites by clicking the heart icon on their cards.

bookingForm.title: Book trial lesson
bookingForm.description: Our experienced tutor will assess your current language level, discuss your learning goals, and tailor the lesson to your specific needs.

success.bookingWithEmail: Your booking was sent successfully and email confirmation was sent.
success.bookingWithoutEmail: Booking created successfully, but email notification failed.

errors.loginRequired: You must be logged in to book a lesson.
errors.teacherNotFound: Teacher data not found. Please refresh the page.

loginForm.title: Log In
loginForm.description: Welcome back! Please enter your credentials to access your account and continue your search for a teacher.

messages.emailChangeReauth: Recent authentication required for email change
messages.securityReauth: Recent authentication required for security reasons

passwordReset.title: Reset Password
passwordReset.heading: Reset Your Password
passwordReset.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

emailVerification.title: Email Verification Required
emailVerification.heading: Email Verification Required
emailVerification.description: Your email {email} is not verified yet. Please check your inbox and click the verification link, or request a new one.
emailVerification.helpText: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or try resending.

signUpForm.title: Sign Up
signUpForm.description: Create your account to find the best teachers and start your learning journey today.

bookingDeleteModal.title: Confirm Deletion
bookingDeleteModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete this reservation?

passwordResetHandler.title: Reset Your Password
passwordResetHandler.description: Please enter your new password below. Make sure it's secure and easy for you to remember.

validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long
validation.resetFailed: Password reset failed. Please try again.

emailChangeHandler.title: Email Change Confirmation
emailChangeHandler.success: Your email has been successfully changed!
emailChangeHandler.error: Email change failed. Please try again.
emailChangeHandler.linkExpired: This email change link has expired. Please request a new one.
emailChangeHandler.linkUsed: This email change link has already been used.
emailChangeHandler.invalidLink: Invalid email change link. Please request a new one.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.name: Name

changeEmailModal.title: Change Email Address
changeEmailModal.description: We'll send a verification link to your new email address. You'll need to verify it before the change takes effect.
changeEmailModal.success: Verification email sent successfully! Please check your inbox.
changeEmailModal.error: Failed to send verification email. Please try again.

validation.emailRequired: Please enter a valid email address
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.emailAlreadyInUse: This email is already in use by another account
validation.recentLoginRequired: For security reasons, please log in again before changing your email

deleteAccountModal.title: Delete Account
deleteAccountModal.description: This action cannot be undone. Please enter your email address to confirm account deletion.

validation.emailMismatch: Email doesn't match your account email

deleteAccountModal.error: Failed to delete account. Please try again.

profile.updateError: Failed to update profile. Please try again.

passwordReset.emailSentSuccess: Password reset email sent! Please check your inbox.
passwordReset.genericError: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again.
passwordReset.userNotFound: No user found with this email address.
passwordReset.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later.

registration.successMessage: Welcome, {username}! Please check your email to verify your account.
registration.emailExists: This email address is already registered.
registration.passwordWeak: Password is too weak. Minimum 6 characters required.
registration.emailInvalidFormat: Please enter a valid email address.

login.wrongCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please check your credentials and try again.
login.userNotExists: No account found with this email address.
login.emailInvalidFormat: Please enter a valid email address.
login.accountDisabled: This account has been temporarily disabled.
login.tooManyAttempts: Too many failed login attempts. Please try again later.
